name: MLImageSizeConstraint
desc: A list or range of sizes that augment an image constraint's default size.

items.name: var type: MLImageSizeConstraintType
items.desc: Indicator of which properties to inspect for this image size constraint.

items.name: enum MLImageSizeConstraintType
items.desc: The modes that determine how the model defines a feature's image size constraint.

items.name: var pixelsWideRange: NSRange
items.desc: The range of widths a model's image feature accepts as input or produces as output.

items.name: var pixelsHighRange: NSRange
items.desc: The range of heights a model's image feature accepts as input or produces as output.

items.name: var enumeratedImageSizes: [MLImageSize]
items.desc: An array of image sizes a model's image feature accepts as input or produces as output.

items.name: class MLImageSize
items.desc: The width and height of an image feature size.
